subject: Re: [junit] Help needed
msgSnippet: ... It depends. Show us the methods. Ron Jeffries www.XProgramming.com The opinions expressed here /are/ necessarily those of XProgramming.com. But I might
messageBody:
On Wednesday, January 28, 2004, at 6:05:27 PM, mona ahuja wrote:

> I have a question if I have a method in a class which calls 2 other methods of the same class. How do
> unit test this method.How do I check if its passing correct parameters to other methods. eg
> method XYZ()
> {
> int x;
> int y;
> aa(x);
> bb(y);
> }
> aa() ,bb(),XYZ() are all methods of the same class.
> I can unit test aa() and bb()in isolation but how do I test that methos XYZ is passing correct values tp
> aa and bb

It depends. Show us the methods.

Ron Jeffries
www.XProgramming.com
The opinions expressed here /are/ necessarily those of XProgramming.com.
But I might change my mind.
